sentences: See koht on väga tuntud turismisihtkoht.
Olen kuulnud, et tegemist on tuntud probleemiga.
context: The word 'tuntud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'tundma', which means 'to know'. In its adjectival form, it describes something or someone that is widely known, famous, or recognized. It can be used to describe people (famous individuals), places (well-known locations), things (recognized concepts), or issues (known problems). The word agrees in number and case with the noun it modifies.
